members.name: DocumentOrShadowRoot.activeElement
members.description: Returns the element within the shadow tree that has focus.

members.name: DocumentOrShadowRoot.styleSheets
members.description: Returns a StyleSheetList of CSSStyleSheet objects for stylesheets explicitly linked into, or embedded in a document

members.name: DocumentOrShadowRoot.getSelection()
members.description: Returns a Selection object representing the range of text selected by the user, or the current position of the caret.

members.name: DocumentOrShadowRoot.elementFromPoint()
members.description: Returns the topmost element at the specified coordinates.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The horizontal coordinate of a point.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The vertical coordinate of a point.

members.name: DocumentOrShadowRoot.elementsFromPoint()
members.description: Returns an array of all elements at the specified coordinates.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The horizontal coordinate of a point.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The vertical coordinate of a point.

members.name: DocumentOrShadowRoot.caretPositionFromPoint()
members.description: Returns a CaretPosition object containing the DOM node containing the caret, and caret's character offset within that node.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The horizontal coordinate of a point.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The vertical coordinate of a point.
